title: [QUESTION] System.IO.FileNotFoundExcption : Could not load file or assembly 'gtk-sharp
body:
I am trying to test view in nunit test project.
View uses **SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.SKCanvasView** internally. Therefore, I include **SkiaSharp.Views.Forms.GTK** as NuGet Dependencies like below. (#1225)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9730869/130028056-4817833f-7cfb-4805-9873-2d1c23c2ab1a.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9730869/130028489-f7a63ffa-a391-49a9-b9a3-102afcadec5d.png)

But after build I am getting following exception,

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/9730869/130028677-7161c4fe-2ef3-4383-844b-988a3105a021.png)

Is there a way to solve this?

I can find **gtk-sharp.dll** in _/Library/Frameworks/Mono.framework/Versions/6.12.0/lib/mono/gac/gtk-sharp/2.12.0.0__35e10195dab3c99f_ folder.
I tried install GTK# (https://www.mono-project.com/docs/gui/gtksharp/).

However **OpenTK 3.0.1** does not depends on .NET Framework. Why it is restoring using .NET Framework?
